wordGroup: fall semester 秋季班，秋季学期

sentences.en: Do you think you'll pledge this semester?
sentences.cn: 这学期你想加入大学生联谊会吗？

sentences.en: If I spend a semester in Madrid, will my credits transfer?
sentences.cn: 如果我在马德里上一学期的课，我的学分能转过来吗？

sentences.en: You will need to complete three written assignments per semester.
sentences.cn: 你每学期要完成三个书面作业。
